title: Bloomberg Markets: Home Depot Rebuilds Sales on Housing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Home Depot Rebuilds Sales on Housing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Seema Shah Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Home Depot boosting sales-growth momentum through an "interconnected retailer" strategy, a focus on customer service, product authority and disciplined capital allocation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
